description: BL9 chunk
BL9 chunk MK ii
Remains of BL9 that took a form of a blade-like tendril, it's possible to craft BL9-tendril sword with this
Remains of BL9 that took a form of a stretching worm-like organism, it's possible to craft BL9-worm whip with this
BL9 sample infused with remains of broken mechanical claws, it's possible to craft BL9-infused claws with this
BL9 sample infused with remains of Repto's giant claw, it's possible to craft BL9 Repto spear with this
Remains of BL9 samples that took a form of a spindly spiked parasitem, it's possible to craft BL9-spike sword with this
Remains of BL9 Assassin's samples infused with his sharp tail, it's possible to craft BL9 tail whip with this
Remains of BL9 Twisted One's samples infused with whatever is left of his tentacles, it's possible to craft BL9-tentacle axe with this
Remains of BL9 tentacles samples that took a form of a sharp blade, it's possible to craft BL9 bladed tentacle claws with this
Remains of BL9 samples that took a form of a spiked worm-like parasite, it's possible to craft BL9-worm spiked polearm with this
Remains of BL9 samples that took a form of a spiked tentacle, it's possible to craft BL9-tentacle spiked flail with this
BL9 sample infused with remains of evolved Repto's astoundingly enormous claw, it's possible to craft BL9 evolved Repto spear with this
Remains of BL9 Chimera's samples that took a form of a deadly mouth with a giant pincer, it's possible to craft BL9-pincer sword with this
Remains of BL9 samples that took a form of huge fan-like claws, it's possible to craft BL9 evolved claws with this
Remains of BL9 Vile One's samples that took a form of a giant spiked crustacean leg, it's possible to craft BL9 spiked sledgehammer with this

An organism sample of a very strange and unknown origin, as you touch it you can clearly feel how it's vibrating, moving more wildly than the ordinary samples, it seems like common samples around it move and act in accordance with the 'waves' that it sends to them, you need to bring this to BL9 Research Base
Lots of different and miscellaneous tech and equipment used by lab staff and scientists, you need to bring this to BL9 Research Base

Hastily made Cult notes describing cooperation between their leader and some wise organization, having great powers with blood of their god bestowed upon them which this organization possesess, all kinds of gibberish too, you need to bring this to BL9 Research Base

Strangely colored alien minerals of some sorts of an unknown origin, they are shifting from one aggregate state to another yet still retaining their form and shape, you need to bring this to BL9 Research Base

Carefully assembled 'THEIR' representative's intel with a personal diary and main base of operations main location describing experiments on cultists, BL9 symbiosis results, choice of hosts and their capabilities once they are injected with symbiote, calculations and explanations of biological processes which occur in BL9 hosts, you need to bring this to BL9 Research Base

A quite thick diary containing all sorts of information including BL9 experiment results, plans to utilize BL9, strengthening humans and using as defense against blob, slowly turning into more and more wild and dehumanizing ideas of using BL9 eventually turning into evil mastermind plans of world domination and purely maniacal thoughts written on this paper here, you need to bring this to BL9 Research Base

A strangely designed alien communication device, it seems like it's been created by an advanced alien civilization both for communicating with their kin and sending data that they acquire from this power station for whatever reason it seems, you need to bring this to BL9 Research Base

A strangely designed alien control device, it seems like it's been created by an advanced alien civilization for sending sound waves of unknown frequency to control BL9 in weak-minded or intelligence lacking hosts both for experiments and assembling their own army as well, you need to bring this to BL9 Research Base

Lots of different and miscellaneous Arganoide tech and equipment used for assembling, amplifying devices for generation and conversion of energy, production, refining and enhancing materials. In order to utilize it, one needs to have knowledge of these alien technologies. You need to bring this to Android in BL9 Safety Base

Lots of different and miscellaneous Wanzeltium tech and equipment used for assembling, amplifying devices for generation and conversion of energy, production, refining and enhancing materials. In order to utilize it, one needs to have knowledge of these alien technologies. You need to bring this to Android in BL9 Safety Base

Lots of different and miscellaneous Davranide tech and equipment used for assembling, amplifying devices for generation and conversion of energy, production, refining and enhancing materials. In order to utilize it, one needs to have knowledge of these alien technologies. You need to bring this to Android in BL9 Safety Base

Lots of different and miscellaneous Saldenium tech and equipment used for assembling, amplifying devices for generation and conversion of energy, production, refining and enhancing materials. In order to utilize it, one needs to have knowledge of these alien technologies. You need to bring this to Android in BL9 Safety Base

Whoever finds this map - THIS IS A DISTRESS SIGNAL. Long-time survivors, we are in need of your help. This map contains location of one of BL9 Safety Bases, where you need to go to receive further instructions. This map also contains locations of 15 structures ranging from gigantic to huge, filled with all sorts of enemies, both human and alien, that either need to be entirely destroyed or captured with your help. All explanations about this you can find in intel or journals, which can be found in BL9 Safety Bases, BL9 Libraries, BL9 Bookstores. If you want to help us, go to one of BL9 Safety Bases, then follow this order of locations.
 
    Castle of Cult, then Anomalies in this order: Abandoned Lab, Cult Lair, Abandoned Factory, Cult Dungeon, then Military Island, then Biomes in this order: Hive Caves, Underground Ruins Caves, Acid Caves, Water Caves, Lava Caves, then Alien Dominators' Mobile Bases in this order: Arganoides, Wanzeltiums, Davranides, Saldeniums as well

use_action.message: You carefully examine the map and spot the entrances of one of BL9 Safety Bases along with 15 huge structures which go in exactly the same order as in map's description as well
